TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UmAlQuraCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UmAlQuraCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示沙特阿拉伯 (Um Al Qura) 回历。

span.span: Represents the Saudi Hijri (Um Al Qura) calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与类几乎完全相同 ，不同之处在于，古兰经历使用从沙特阿拉伯政府版获得的基于表的算法来计算日期，可以将日期表达为1500年的 A.H.，不支持该 属性。The class is nearly identical to the class, except the Um Al Qura calendar uses a table-based algorithm licensed from the Saudi government to calculate dates, can express dates to the year 1500 A.H., and does not support the property. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用 .NET Framework 中的类和其他 calendar 类的信息，请参阅使用 [日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 对于 类，每个月有29或30天，但通常不是任何可辨识的顺序。For the class, each month has either 29 or 30 days, but usually in no discernible order. 虽然回历的文档提供了一个表，其中显示了每个月中的相应日期，但不能为古兰经历生成此类通用表。Whereas the documentation for the Hijri Calendar gives a table that shows the corresponding days in each month, no such general table can be produced for the Um Al Qura calendar. 有关回历的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about the Hijri calendar, see the class. **注意**类仅支持 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (公历日期) 到 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (公历日期) 中的日期。**Note** The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例：日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime AddMonths (DateTime time, int months);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime AddMonths(valuetype System.DateTime time, int32 months) cil managed
Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);
override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

span.span: The date to which to add months.
The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的正月数或负月数。

span.span: The positive or negative number of months to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定月数的日期。

span.span: Calculates a date that is a specified number of months away from a specified initial date.

returns.span: 在将 参数指定的月数加到 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

span.span: The date yielded by adding the number of months specified by the parameter to the date specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出了指定的年份，则结果中的年份部分 会受到影响 。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发异常 。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah （包含30天），指定的日期是该月的30天，并且参数的值 `months` 为3，则生成的年份比指定年份多一，结果月份是 Safar，而结果日为第29天，即 Safar 中的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar. 如果参数的值 `months` 为负，则生成的值 早于指定的 。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的示例实例化一个 值，并在古兰经历中显示它的多个组件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um Al Qura calendar. 接下来，它调用 和 方法，以将古兰经历中的2年和10个月添加到日期值。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最后，再次在古兰经历中显示这些日期部分的值。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

span.span: The resulting date is outside the range supported by the class.
is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.

span.span: The date to which to add years.
The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

param.name: years
param.span: 要添加的正年数或负年数。

span.span: The positive or negative number of years to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定年数的日期。

span.span: Calculates a date that is a specified number of years away from a specified initial date.

returns.span: 在将 参数指定的年数加到 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

span.span: The date yielded by adding the number of years specified by the parameter to the date specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所得的月份部分将 保持与指定的相同 。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发异常 。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，Zulhijjah 有29天，在闰年为30天的情况下除外。For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中 Zulhijjah 的30天，并且参数的值 `years` 为1，则生成的日期为下一年 Zulhijjah 的第29天。If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date is the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year. 如果 `years` 为负，则生成的 早于指定的 。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的示例实例化一个 值，并在古兰经历中显示它的多个组件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um AL Qura calendar. 接下来，它调用 和 方法，以将古兰经历中的2年和10个月添加到日期值。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最后，再次在古兰经历中显示这些日期部分的值。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回历识别一个纪元： A.H。The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁语 "基督 Hegirae"，这意味着 "迁移的年份"，其中 (从 Mecca) 迁移 Muhammad PBUH) 。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). 此属性始终返回只包含一个元素的数组。This property always returns an array with only one element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些 值如下所示：The values are as follows: |DayOfWeek 值DayOfWeek value|这表示which indicates| |---------------------|---------------------| |星期日Sunday|الاحد (Ahad) الاحد (Al-Ahad)| |星期一Monday|الاثنين (Ithnayn) الاثنين (Al-Ithnayn)| |星期二Tuesday|الثلاثاء (Thulaathaa ") الثلاثاء (At-Thulaathaa')| |星期三Wednesday|الاربعاء (Arbi'aa ") الاربعاء (Al-Arbi'aa')| |星期四Thursday|الخميس (Khamiis) الخميس (Al-Khamiis)| |星期五Friday|الجمعة (Jumu'ah) الجمعة (Al-Jumu'ah)| |星期六Saturday|السبت (Sabt) السبت (As-Sabt)| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了中的多个组件的值 。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 计算指定日期出现在年中的哪一天。

span.span: Calculates the day of the year on which a specified date occurs.

returns.span: 一个从 1 到 355 的整数，表示 参数指定的日期是年中的哪一天。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 355 that represents the day of the year specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，该方法将在一 年的第一个月的第一天返回1，并在上个月的最后一天返回一年中的总天数。For example, the method returns 1 for the first day of the first month of the year, and the total number of days in the year for the last day of the last month. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了中的多个组件的值 。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

span.span: The return value is 29 in a common year and 30 in a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个共同年份与闰年不同的指定月份的天数。This method returns a different number of days in a specified month for a common year versus a leap year. 例如，根据是否为闰年，此方法为 Zulhijjah (`month` = 12) 返回29或 30 `year` 。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法，以获取每个月连续年份的天数。The following example calls the method to get the number of days in each month of five consecutive years. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持闰月的概念的日历中，闰月可以在特定月份之后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如， 方法返回1到13之间的一个数字，用于指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果一年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月，则该方法将为 第八个月返回8，为第八个月返回9，在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法非常有用，因为它可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 以后可以使用公历日期来比较不同日历中的日期或在特定日历中创建等效日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个从 0 到 99 的两位数年份，或一个从 1318 到 1450 的四位数 Um Al Qura 日历年份。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Um Al Qura calendar year from 1318 through 1450.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 参数是两位数年份，则返回值是对应的四位数年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 参数是四位数年份，则返回值是未更改的 参数。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 `year` 参数、 属性和年份来计算四位数年份。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 通过在 `year` 该100年范围内查找2位参数的唯一匹配项来确定纪元。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the 2-digit `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果 设置为1429，则100年范围是从1330到1429。For example, if is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1330，而两位数字的值29则解释为1429。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 如果该 属性是特殊值99，则该 方法将忽略 "控制面板" 中 "区域和语言选项" 中的设置，并返回 `year` 未更改的参数。If the property is the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the `year` parameter unchanged. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果将两位数的年份值 (小于 100) ，则会使方法根据表示相应世纪的值将值转换为四位值 。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值 ，则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值，或者如果它提供负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了此日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许将两位数的年份正确翻译为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果将此属性设置为1429，则100年范围是从1330到1429。For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1330，而两位数字的值29则解释为1429。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 此属性的初始值派生自控制面板的 "区域和语言选项" 部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息在的生命周期内可能会更改 。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不会自动检测系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 特殊值99使 方法忽略系统设置并返回指定年份不变。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

exception.span: 此日历为只读。

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: 在设置操作中，Um Al Qura 年份值小于 1318 而不是 99，或者大于 1450。

span.span: In a set operation, the Um Al Qura calendar year value is less than 1318 but not 99, or is greater than 1450.

MemberSignature.Value: public const int UmAlQuraEra = 1;
.field public static literal int32 UmAlQuraEra = (1)
Public Const UmAlQuraEra As Integer = 1
public: int UmAlQuraEra = 1;
val mutable UmAlQuraEra : int

summary.span: 表示当前纪元。

span.span: Represents the current era.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字段的值 为1。The value of the field is 1. 古兰经历识别一个纪元： A.H。The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁语 "基督 Hegirae"，这意味着 "迁移的年份"，其中 (从 Mecca) 迁移 Muhammad PBUH) 。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
